title: Not Bitly
description: A URL shortener webapp. Features ability to keep track of your shortened link's data such as total visits and visits per day.

title: Ultimate Tic Tac Toe
description: It looks like traditional tic-tac-toe, but it has much more depth with its strategic elements. You can play against the AI or locally with someone else. The AI uses [Monte Carlo tree search](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Monte_Carlo_tree_search).

title: React Theremin
description: A musical webapp where the sound produced is determined from the position of your mouse cursor. Based on the [theremin](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Theremin), a musical instrument.

title: Alphabet Soup
description: Animated messages with css and javascript. Letters that are scattered around the screen arrange themselves to form messages.

title: Pomodoro timer
description: A timer for users that follow the [pomodoro technique](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pomodoro_Technique).

title: Conway's Game of Life
description: An implementation of the famous cellular automaton, [Conway's Game of Life](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Conway%27s_Game_of_Life).

title: My Website
description: You're on it right now! This site is built with Gatsby and React.
